## degeneracy
* graphclasses.org: [degeneracy](https://www.graphclasses.org/classes/par_17.html)
* [â†—](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Degeneracy_(graph_theory)) ... the least $k$ for which there exists an ordering of the vertices of $G$ in which each vertex has fewer than $k$ neighbors that are earlier in the ordering.
